entity.name: South Korea becomes most infected country outside China for coronavirus as cases spike
entity.description: The country designated multiple cities as "special care zones" as more people were diagnosed with the virus on Saturday, bringing the national total to more than 400. Some of the newly infected are largely linked to a church in Daegu, one of the newly classified zones.
